name: We're Drifting Apart
description:
Our relationship has been rough lately. I feel like you're being distant... I'm worried that we're drifting apart.

We're Drifting Apart is a game incepted and created for the GMTK 2021 Jam. It plays with the theme of a turbulent relationship which is perpetually under threat. How long can you keep your relationship from drifting apart?

This game was created by Alessandro "Ollie" D'Amico. All art was made during the jam. The song, temporarily titled "Love," was written and produced by Ollie in 2015. Special thanks to Chase aka "cha5m" for his support throughout development.
